title: WTB: N162 Goodwin Brouthers low-grade but good eye appeal

posts.post_title: WTB: N162 Goodwin Brouthers low-grade but good eye appeal
posts.post_content: Let me know if you have one available. For me, it's all about eye-appeal so authentic, trimmed, pin holes, or reverse paper loss is fine, even preferable if the price is right. Thanks.
